summary: 13 live tests run against the refactored monitor server. All acceptance criteria pass: GET / returns v3 HTML (200), GET /v2 and /v2/* return 404 with correct message, GET /v3 still works as a legacy alias (200), all 5 API endpoints (/api/runs, /api/run, /api/events, /api/log, /api/files) respond correctly, monitor/public-v2/ and monitor/public/ (v1) directories are deleted, and monitor/server.mjs contains no stale v1/v2 route serving code. Two MINOR doc-only bugs found: docs/operations.md still lists /v2 as a live route (should say removed/404), and docs/README.md description of monitor.md still mentions /v2. No critical or major issues.
issues: MINOR: docs/operations.md:62-64 — UI routes section still lists /v2 as a valid route and labels / as (legacy). Should be updated to reflect /v2 is removed.
MINOR: docs/README.md:10 — description of monitor.md still mentions /v2 in the UI routes list.
